HomePage.Paragraph1: A junior web developer with more than two years of work experiences. I have been working with HTML, CSS,JavaScript, JQuery, SQL, and MySQL databases. I have a great knowledge of PHP, Bootstrap, and CMS such as WordPress, and Joomla. I am a self-starter, self-learner, and enthusiastic to tackle new programing strategies and software.Read More...
HomePage.Paragraph2: You can see some examples of my work in Projects page. Most of them are designed and developed with WordPress CMS (include of HTML, CSS, JS), and some are examples of academic projects.
HomePage.Paragraph3: As a web designer and programmer, I can provide services and support them well. You can always contact me during the project to know about the progress of the project. For more details please take a look at my services on the Service page.
HomePage.Paragraph4: To contact me, you can send your message through the form on the Contact page and I will respond as soon as possible.
